code: import axios from'axios';import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{Table}from'react-bootstrap';import TableLoader from'../../Shared/TableOrder/TableOrder';import Order from'./Order';import'./OrderList.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const OrderList=()=>{const[orders,setOrders]=useState([]);const[isUpdated,setIsUpdated]=useState(false);useEffect(()=>{axios.get('https://immense-river-40491.herokuapp.com/orders').then(res=>setOrders(res.data));},[isUpdated]);const handleAction=(id,status)=>{setIsUpdated(true);axios.patch("https://immense-river-40491.herokuapp.com/statusUpdate/".concat(id),{status:status}).then(res=>res.data&&setIsUpdated(false));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"px-2",children:orders.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableLoader,{}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"orderList",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Table,{hover:true,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Email ID"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Service"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Status"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:orders.map(order=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Order,{order:order,handleAction:handleAction},order._id))})]})})});};export default OrderList;
